title: 0 RP/ESSENCE.
body: Ok so I log in to the PBE server and I just register right now. Once i log in, I notice that I have 0 rp and blue essence. I have the lvl 30 but I want the rp and essence, please help me. My pbe account name is TruLegend25

replies.body: PBE currency are on a daily stipend now.  you should see your balance reset around noon pacific time.
